headline: 41.6% of Billionaire Bill Ackman's Hedge Fund Is Invested in These 3 Unstoppable Companies
summary: Let's apply that strategy by looking at Pershing Square Capital Management, a hedge fund led by the billionaire Bill Ackman.  A sizable percentage -- 41.6%, to be exact -- of the hedge fund's portfolio is in three companies: Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL), Uber Technologies (NYSE: UBER), and Chipotle Mexican Grill (NYSE: CMG).

headline: Chipotle Stock Has Rolled Its Way Back. Wall Street Isn't Looking for Much More
summary: Chipotle's stock has recovered from its post-"Liberation Day" slump. Wall Street doesn't expect much more upside. What gives?
